title: Kerry Katona posts worrying photos from hospital bed after mystery illness
text:
Kerry Katona has posted photos from hospital (Picture: Instagram)

Kerry Katona has posted a series of photos after being taken to hospital with a mystery illness.

The mum-of-five was seen looking pale as she wasted time taking selfies and spending at least a day in hospital waiting for a diagnosis.

In one photo, the star is seen with a drip in her arm, while in the other she is lying in bed in a hospital gown with the caption: ‘Still no news.’

Metro.co.uk has contacted Kerry’s reps for comment.

Thankfully Kerry wasn’t alone with boyfriend Ryan Mahoney there to look after her and keep her company.

The star recently praised him for helping her get back on her feet after the pair met and started dating through Bumble 18 months ago.

The star snapped a pic with a drip in her arm (Picture: Instagram)

In a selfie of the pair beaming into the camera, she wrote two days ago: ‘Awww I don’t post many pics of me and Ryan but I just want you all to know that this man has helped me find my self worth.

‘So just a little note to say thank you @ryanmahoney_7not just from me but from the kids WE LOVE YOU and we appreciate everything that you have done for us all.’
